sentences.en: After climbing mountains in the Swiss Alps, going up English hills is a piece of cake.
sentences.cn: 爬过了瑞士的阿尔卑斯山后, 爬英国的小山简直是小菜一碟.

sentences.en: French troops negotiated the Alps and went on the road in Italy.
sentences.cn: 法军成功地越过了阿尔卑斯山脉，行军在意大利的国土上。

sentences.en: From the summit there is a superb panorama of the Alps.
sentences.cn: 从峰巅俯瞰,阿尔卑斯山壮丽的景色尽收眼底.

sentences.en: Hannibal was now crossing the Alps.
sentences.cn: 汉尼拔那时正在翻越阿尔卑斯山.

sentences.en: I'm going skating in the Alps next month.
sentences.cn: 下个月我去阿尔卑斯山滑雪.

sentences.en: In the distance rose the majestic Alps.
sentences.cn: 远处耸立着雄伟的阿尔卑斯山.

sentences.en: It takes a lot of guts to climb the Alps.
sentences.cn: 爬阿尔卑斯山必须有很大的勇气.

sentences.en: Lyons is the gateway to the Alps for motorists driving out from Britain.
sentences.cn: 里昂是从英国驱车前往阿尔卑斯山的门户。

sentences.en: Most often mist hides the illusory Alps.
sentences.cn: 云雾常常遮掩了梦幻般的阿尔卑斯山脉.

sentences.en: Soon they were safe over the ALPS.
sentences.cn: 不久,他们就安然无恙地翻过了阿尔卑斯山.

sentences.en: The group has adventured as far as the Austrian alps.
sentences.cn: 该队伍的探险之旅远至奥地利的阿尔卑斯山。

sentences.en: The high mountainous Alps in the west of Austria flatten somewhat into low lands and plains in the east of the country.
sentences.cn: 奥地利西面的阿尔卑斯高山变得有些平坦，直接和国家的东面的低地和平原融为一体。

sentences.en: The other way was over the Alps.
sentences.cn: 另一条路是翻越阿尔卑斯山.

sentences.en: The river springs in the Alps.
sentences.cn: 这条河发源于阿尔卑斯山脉.

sentences.en: The snowy Alps stand out in bold relief against the blue sky.
sentences.cn: 白雪皑皑的阿尔卑斯山在蓝色天空的衬托下鲜明地耸立着.
他们飞过了阿尔卑斯山.

sentences.en: They headed the storm crossing over Alps to Italy.
sentences.cn: 他们迎着暴风雪越过了阿尔卑斯山脉，朝着意大利进发。

sentences.en: They were killed by an avalanche in the Swiss Alps.
sentences.cn: 他们在瑞士阿尔卑斯山的一次雪崩中罹难.

phrases.tran_cn: 巴伐利亚山脉；巴伐利亚阿尔卑斯山脉
